document_info.title: Changa and Enhanced Leaf - Smokable DMT Preparations
document_info.purpose: Guide to creating smokable DMT herb blends
document_info.disclaimer: Educational reference only. Documents historical administration research.

enhanced_leaf.definition: Method of administration where DMT freebase is dissolved in solvent with smokable herb and allowed to evaporate
enhanced_leaf.advantage: Easier administration than pure freebase DMT

step_1.action: Thoroughly dissolve freebase DMT in warm solvent
step_1.ratio: About 40ml solvent per gram of DMT

step_2.action: Use dish with width allowing leaf to sit 5-10mm high

step_3.action: Add leaf to DMT-saturated solvent, swirl for even distribution

step_4.action: Add more solvent if needed so leaf is well covered

step_5.action: Place dish somewhere undisturbed for several days until completely dry

step_6.action: Weigh dried leaf - should be heavier by amount of DMT added

smoking_technique.method: Load cone and pull VERY SLOWLY
smoking_technique.warning: Pulling too fast won't vaporize DMT properly - wastes material

changa.definition: Smoking mixture containing similar ingredients to Ayahuasca

key_ingredients.variable: Many varieties with different herb combinations

effects.character: More grounded than freebase DMT alone
effects.duration: Slightly longer than freebase - reports up to 12 minutes
effects.combination_use: Can be used with Ayahuasca to intensify and revisit experience

advantages: Much easier to use than freebase DMT
Can be smoked in ordinary pipe or water pipe
DMT freebase difficult to vaporize on its own - changa solves this

typical_mixture.characteristic: Breakthrough experiences at approximately one pipe
typical_mixture.joint_use: Reports of breakthroughs with changa rolled into joints

banisteriopsis_caapi.effect: Adds spirit quality, potentiates and lengthens experience

sculcap.effect: Strengthens, calms and sedates nervous system

wild_lettuce.effect: Strengthens, calms and sedates nervous system

pau_darco.effect: Rich and exuberant meadows of pleasure

chaliponga.effect: Adds spirit quality and more magic

dosing_considerations.breakthrough_dose: Varies by blend - typically one full pipe

safety_notes.maoi_interactions: Be aware of MAOI dietary and drug interactions
safety_notes.salvia_warning: Salvia can significantly alter experience character
